task_summary: Pick up a bottle from the current location, using incrementally refined perception and a top grasp.

task_long_description.overview: This episode centers on a robot identifying, approaching, and grasping a green translucent bottle placed against a blue background. The task requires reliable perception and precise motion as the manipulator moves closer to the bottle, culminating in a top-down grasp. Scene constraints include limited visual context, object isolation, and the expectation of careful approach.
preconditions: Bottle is present and unobstructed on blue surface
Robot gripper is empty and ready
stepwise_plan: Check if bottle is visible; if not, scan up to 3 times
Move above the bottle with a safe vertical offset
Approach and align with precise tolerance
Execute grasp action at computed pose
success_criteria: Bottle is securely held by the gripper
failure_and_recovery: If bottle not visible, perform scan pattern up to 3 attempts
If grasp unstable, abort or retry from initial detection
task_long_description.termination: Task completes upon confirmed stable grasp of the bottle.

frame_3.now_evidence: first stable contact and alignment cue visible
frame_3.predicts_next: push actuation expected; confirms goal direction

node_specs.description: Check if the bottle is currently visible to the robot.
Perform a raster-pattern scan to search for the bottle, repeating up to 3 times.
Run bottle detection with an 800 ms timeout.
Move vertically above the bottle by 5 cm, with a 1500 ms cutoff.
Approach the bottle and align with a precise 0.005 m tolerance (5 mm), for up to 1500 ms.
Compute a top grasp pose for the bottle and store as std_top.
Perform a grasp using the computed top pose (std_top), with a 1000 ms timeout.
Confirm the stability of the executed grasp.

recovery_strategy: Abort if grasp fails or stability not verified
assumptions: Bottle is present and unobstructed (verified via frames)
No direct place or retreat needed after grasp, as inferred from lack of post-grasp frames
Instruction covers only pick up, omitting transfer or placement phases

expected_success_criteria: Robot securely holds the bottle at task end
Bottle visible in gripper (if next scene were shown)
